document_data.name: Nari ibn Aman
document_data.mainbody: Prince '''Nari ibn Aman''' was a member of the royal family of [[Kadarasto]] in [[Zakhara]] in [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}{{cite book/Land of Fate/Fortunes and Fates|21}}
document_data.Personallity: Nari was an intense individual who had quick temper. Despite this he was far more popular among Kadarasto's poor population when compared to his father.
document_data.Activities: Prince Nari commanded Kadarasto's armed forces. He was viewed as a local hero for striking down tomb-robbers, eliminating [[Dihliz]]'s sanctioned thieves, and striving to punish all who plundered the ruins near Kadarasto.
document_data.Relationships: Nari was a young member of the royal family and son of Khedive [[Aman al-Qasi abu Nari]]. The [[Devout Mamluk Society|Devout]] were his personal bodyguards.
